subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch won the Nationwide Series race at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon, N.H., and become the career laps led leader in Nascar’s second-tier series.
snippet: Kyle Busch won the Nationwide Series race at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon, N.H., and become the career laps led leader in Nascar’s second-tier series.
